name: The Witch and Her Assistant
description:
"The Witch and Her Assistant" is a short visual novel about a young witch living alone in her cottage and an encounter in the forest, made for Otome Game Jam 2021.

✽CHARACTERS✽

✽CREDITS✽
> Story & Graphics : Karamelow (MagicBench)
> Music : Salvador Garza Garza (Hanako the Musical Ghost)
> Proofreading/Edit : Ririkutai
